actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the changing of the status of refugees from Indochina from that of a parolee to that of a permanent resident alien.

summary.text: Refugee Adjustment Act - Authorizes the changing of the status of refugees from Cambodia, Laos, or Vietnam, upon their application, from that of a parolee to that of a permanent resident alien. Provides that any such change of status shall be in the discretion of the Attorney General.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the changing of the status of refugees from Indochina from that of a parolee to that of a permanent resident alien.
